view.name: system
view.text: "Place your magazines and videos in the "library" directory. Acceptable extensions: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."

"Placez dans le répertoire "library" vos magazines et vidéos afin de pouvoir les consulter ici. Voici les différentes extensions qui sont autorisées : jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
"Legen Sie Ihre Zeitschriften und Videos in das Verzeichnis "library". Akzeptable Erweiterungen: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
"Coloca tus revistas y vídeos en el directorio ""biblioteca"". Extensiones aceptables: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
"Inserire le riviste e i video nella directory "library". Estensioni accettabili: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
"雑誌やビデオは、""library ""ディレクトリに置いてください。 使用可能な拡張子：jpg、jpeg、png、bmp、psd、tga、gif、hdr、pic、ppm、pgm、mkv、pdf、MP4、AVI、CBZ。"
"Plaats uw tijdschriften en video's in de map ""bibliotheek"". Aanvaardbare extensies: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
"Czasopisma i filmy umieszczaj w katalogu "library". Akceptowane rozszerzenia: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
"Coloque as suas revistas e vídeos no directório ""biblioteca"". Extensões aceitáveis: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
"Поместите ваши журналы и видео в каталог "library". Приемлемые расширения: jpg, jpeg, png, bmp, psd, tga, gif, hdr, pic, ppm, pgm, mkv, pdf, mp4, avi, cbz."
